articles.author: Jessie Yeung
articles.title: Qantas cyber hack could have stolen ‘significant’ amount of data from six million customers - CNN
articles.description: Australian airline Qantas says a data hack on Monday exposed the personal information of six million customers and it expects the amount stolen to be “significant.”
articles.content:
Australian airline Qantas says a data hack on Monday exposed the personal information of six million customers and it expects the amount stolen to be significant.
